content: Your accommodation is ready, I'll be waiting for you!

content: I hope we get along well.

content: I-I—I'll get ready right away! First, I need to stuff all these Kabutomaru supplies into my bag — almost forgot that homemade beetle jelly...
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1009伊佐奇_伊佐奇

content: Brother Isaki, welcome with open arms! I still remember seeing you catching bugs last time — so tall and mighty. Living on the same planet as you? HMM! What luck!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1009伊佐奇_伊佐奇

content: <style=SizeBig>M-Moving in?!</style> This is a momentous occasion, indeed!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1009伊佐奇_伊佐奇

content: The place is ready. Time to give <style=NpcName>Isaki</style> a call and invite him to move in!

content: At the invitation of <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! <style=SizeBig>Here I stand!</style>
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1009伊佐奇_伊佐奇

content: Mmph... ngh?! <style=SizeBig><style=PlayerName>{me}</style>!</style> You're calling me, so something biiig must have happened, has it not?

content: Uwah! W-Wait for me! I'll be right there!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1009伊佐奇_伊佐奇

content: {A抱歉}My name is Isaki Koko — Uh, um, I-I'm a bit nervous, let me start over. I'm <style=NpcName>Isaki</style>. It's a pleasure to meet you.
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1009伊佐奇_伊佐奇

content: Everything's ready. Welcome to your new home!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1009伊佐奇_伊佐奇

content: Hoho~, thank you all for your warm welcomes. Wishing our new friend a smooth and joyful life here. Now then, today's welcome party has come to a wonderful end!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1009伊佐奇_伊佐奇

content: {A拍手}Welcome! I'm Mobai, the coordinator here. If you need help with anything in your everyday life, just come to me.
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1009伊佐奇_伊佐奇

content: Now, let's welcome <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, the owner of this Planet, to say a few words!
